Detailed Description

Constraints of selection from set of possibilities.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum iprm::ISelectionConstraints::ChangeFlags

Flags for changes related to this interface.

Enumerator:
CF_OPTIONS_CHANGED 

Option list updated.

CF_OPTION_RENAMED 

One or more options were renamed.

Reimplemented from istd::IChangeable.

Definition at line 24 of file ISelectionConstraints.h.

enum iprm::ISelectionConstraints::SelectionContstraintsFlags

Flags for control constraints behavior.

Enumerator:
SCF_NONE 
SCF_SUPPORT_UNIQUE_ID 

If set, every option must have an unique ID.

virtual std::string iprm::ISelectionConstraints::GetOptionId ( int  index) const [pure virtual]

Get option ID.

The option ID must be unique, if flag SCF_SUPPORT_UNIQUE_ID is set.
